welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Beecher, a charming town known for its small-town charm and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer, and we hope you enjoy your time here."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bishop International Airport houses all the necessary facilities for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is the primary departure point for domestic flights at Bishop International Airport. It also features a variety of dining and shopping options for passengers.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B primarily serves international flights at Bishop International Airport. It also offers duty-free shops and a lounge for premium passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tuscola Area Airport serves all commercial flights and includes a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Tuscola Area Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.
